instruction: You are given a sentence in Gujarati language and we ask you to translate those to the English language. Consider following guidelines while doing the translation: 1) Note the input can be lowercase or uppercase. Please do the same in your translations. 2) Keep the short forms like '%s', 'CMD' intact as the literal meaning does not make sense.
input: UPS પાવર પર ચાલી રહેલ કમ્પ્યૂટરને તે ઊંઘે તે પહેલાં અસક્રિય થઈ જવાની જરૂર પડે તે માટેનો સમયનો જથ્થો સેકન્ડોમાં.
output: The amount of time in seconds the computer on UPS power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep.
